Subject: Re: Beachcomber and Redhot (WAS: Introducing Redhot )
References: <9ft267+qaov@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Beachcomber stood up, he didnt have a clue where to begin, but he had to
do something. His eyes narrowed, as he put his fingers together. They
erupted a low powered laser, which he then used to open up the chest of
Redhot, and now scanned inside, for anything out of place.
